description: A sample entity contains information about biological material that was generated/used in the project and includes everything from a whole organism down to subcellular components.
title: sample

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

specimenID.description: A unique ID for this sample.

specimenName.description: A short, descriptive name for the sample that need not be unique.

specimenDescription.description: A general description of the biomaterial.

species.description: A species name from MESH, can be multiple.

has_input_specimen.description: If this specimen is derived from another specimen, enter the specimenID for the specimen it was derived from.
has_input_specimen.comment: This field is primarily required for spreadsheet-based submissions.

genotype.description: Genotype of biomaterial including strain, cross, and genetic modification information.

biosd_biomaterial.description: A DDBJ, NCBI, or EBI BioSample ID. Accessions must start with SAMD, SAMN, or SAME.
